title: PLEASE!!! DRAFT PICK NORMALS
body: Ranked is down and blind pick is absurd... Even when ranked is up i would like to be able to legitimately practice a champion. ATM we have 2 versions of blind pick (blind and team builder) and the only draft Queue is RANKED... PLEASE DRAFT PICK

replies.body: hmm post removed from "hot" section of the boards.. guess riot just dont want to hear how rubbish blind pick is. actually its probably because the post has been down voted... How are people opposed to having draft pick normals back up..... i do not understand.. You can keep ur blind pick but i jsut want to have the option of draft.

no that means your thread was downvoted.

i'm sure we can live a day without ranked.
Team builder is dead on this server. Que times upwards of two hours just to find a lobby.
